title: ???? AI Shorts Video Editor & Voiceover VA (TikTok/YouTube/IG Reels)
job_overview:
We’re hiring a highly creative and detail-oriented AI Video Editor & Voiceover VA to help produce viral short-form content for TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and Instagram Reels.

???? What You’ll Do:

Take provided scripts and turn them into viral short videos
Use 11 Labs to generate voiceovers (we’ll guide if needed)
Edit clips in CapCut (or equivalent), adding captions and dynamic visuals
Create engaging edits with pacing, zooms, cuts, sound effects, etc.

? Requirements:
Experience with CapCut, 11 Labs, or similar tools
Proven ability to edit short-form videos for TikTok/YouTube Shorts/IG Reels
Strong grasp of viral editing styles and hooks
Reliable, fast, and detail-focused
Ability to follow clear creative direction

???? Bonus Points:
You’ve worked on a YouTube automation channels before
Can handle multiple videos per day
